homeHighlight.title: Loeng Him Kaw, a joyful community
homeHighlight.description: "Loeng Him Kaw" is a riverside neighborhood in San Kamphaeng, Chiang Mai where artisans and makers live and work together.

cardsDescriptions.eco: Every activity uses natural, chemical-free materials
cardsDescriptions.culture: Learn from local masters who preserve traditional crafts
cardsDescriptions.craft: 100% of income goes back to community entrepreneurs
cardsDescriptions.slowlife: Pause, unwind, and spend time on the things you love
